data.message: The Facebook app today is.. well.. like it's been for a long time on Samsung S8+. Laggy, crashing and today it won't show notifications. Utterly disappointing. I wish you could get ONE version right.

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Emelie. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this. When things don't work on Facebook we want to fix them right away, so please report what you're experiencing with your mobile app to us here: http://bit.ly/2eIlxym. -Elizabeth
Dunno what that will help when it's been like this since the phone came out. Guess I'll have to stick to Messenger and Facebook Lite.

I had to download FB lite after being frustrated about the full FB version's new feeds. It kills me to see many duplicates of news feeds - the least is 2. On FB lite, sometimes I cannot refresh my feed. 😑😑😑😑😑😑
